Pinyin1: wǒ qù nǎlǐ kěyǐ mǎipiào ？
Chinese1: 我去哪里可以买票？
Translate1: Where can I buy tickets?

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ yòng xiànjīn fùkuǎn ma ？
Chinese1: 我可以用现金付款吗？
Translate1: Can I pay with cash?

Pinyin1: nǐmen yǒu zūchē fúwù ma ？
Chinese1: 你们有租车服务吗？
Translate1: Do you have car rental services?

Pinyin1: qǐng gěi wǒ yīzhāng lǚyóu dìtú 。
Chinese1: 请给我一张旅游地图。
Translate1: Can I have a tourist map please?

Pinyin1: néng bāng wǒ zhǎo yīgè dǎoyóu ma ？
Chinese1: 能帮我找一个导游吗？
Translate1: Can you help me find a guide?

Pinyin1: zhèr yǒu yījiā zhōngcānguǎn ma ？
Chinese1: 这儿有一家中餐馆吗？
Translate1: Is there a Chinese restaurant around here?

Pinyin1: wǒmen qù nǎlǐ mǎi zhèngzōng de dāngdì tèchǎn ？
Chinese1: 我们去哪里买正宗的当地特产？
Translate1: Where can we buy authentic local products?

Pinyin1: wǒmen shénme shíhou kěyǐ qù yóuwán ？
Chinese1: 我们什么时候可以去游玩？
Translate1: When can we go sightseeing?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒu duōshǎo dāngdìrén néng bāngzhù yóukè ？
Chinese1: 这里有多少当地人能帮助游客？
Translate1: How many locals are available to help tourists?

Pinyin1: zhège lǚyóujǐngdiǎn kàojìn nǎlǐ ？
Chinese1: 这个旅游景点靠近哪里？
Translate1: Where is the tourist spot near to?

Pinyin1: wǒ yīnggāi zěnyàng dédào zhèlǐ de yóukè zhèng ？
Chinese1: 我应该怎样得到这里的游客证？
Translate1: How do I get a tourist pass here?

Pinyin1: fùjìn yǒu shénme lǚyóujǐngdiǎn kěyǐ cānguān ？
Chinese1: 附近有什么旅游景点可以参观？
Translate1: What tourist attractions can I visit near here?

Pinyin1: wǒ gāi zài nǎlǐ xúnzhǎo lǚxíng xìnxī ？
Chinese1: 我该在哪里寻找旅行信息？
Translate1: Where can I find travel information?

Pinyin1: jīntiān yǒu shénme jiérì huódòng kěyǐ cānjiā ？
Chinese1: 今天有什么节日活动可以参加？
Translate1: What festivals are there to attend today?

Pinyin1: wǒnéng gòumǎi dāngdì de lǐpǐn gěi péngyou ma ？
Chinese1: 我能购买当地的礼品给朋友吗？
Translate1: Can I buy local gifts for my friends?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒu hěnduō shāngdiàn kěyǐ mǎi lǐwù ma ？
Chinese1: 这里有很多商店可以买礼物吗？
Translate1: Are there many shops to buy gifts here?

Pinyin1: wǒnéng zài nǎlǐ tīngdào dāngdì yīnyuè ？
Chinese1: 我能在哪里听到当地音乐？
Translate1: Where can I listen to local music?

Pinyin1: zěnyàngcáinéng liǎojiě dāngdì de lìshǐ ？
Chinese1: 怎样才能了解当地的历史？
Translate1: How can I learn about the history of the place?

Pinyin1: yǒu nǎxiē xīn de huódòng néng cānjiā ？
Chinese1: 有哪些新的活动能参加？
Translate1: What new activities can I participate in?

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ cānyù dāngdì de bǐsài ma ？
Chinese1: 我可以参与当地的比赛吗？
Translate1: Can I join any competitions in the area?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng qù nǎlǐ lǚyóu ？
Chinese1: 你想去哪里旅游？
Translate1: Where do you want to go on a trip?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng zhù zài nǎlǐ ？
Chinese1: 你想住在哪里？
Translate1: Where do you want to stay?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng mǎi shénme piào ？
Chinese1: 你想买什么票？
Translate1: What kind of ticket do you want to buy?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu liǎojiě dāngdì de wénhuà ？
Chinese1: 你有没有了解当地的文化？
Translate1: Have you researched the local culture?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhǔnbèi zěnme fùkuǎn ？
Chinese1: 你准备怎么付款？
Translate1: How will you pay for the trip?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu kǎolǜ bǎoxiǎn ？
Chinese1: 你有没有考虑保险？
Translate1: Have you considered getting insurance?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng qù nàli kàn shénme ？
Chinese1: 你想去那里看什么？
Translate1: What do you want to see at your destination?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu yùdìng rènhé huódòng huò xíngchéng ？
Chinese1: 你有没有预定任何活动或行程？
Translate1: Have you booked any activities or excursions?

Pinyin1: nǐ néngdài diǎn dōngxi huílai ma ？
Chinese1: 你能带点东西回来吗？
Translate1: Can you bring something back?

Pinyin1: nǐ néng mǎidiǎn dāngdì tèchǎn ma ？
Chinese1: 你能买点当地特产吗？
Translate1: Can you buy some local specialties?

Pinyin1: nǐ jiàn guò dāngdìrén ？
Chinese1: 你见过当地人？
Translate1: Have you met any locals?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu yùdìng jīpiào ？
Chinese1: 你有没有预订机票？
Translate1: Have you booked a flight?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu ānpái dìdiǎn ？
Chinese1: 你有没有安排地点？
Translate1: Have you arranged where to stay?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu mǎi lǚxíng huòbì ？
Chinese1: 你有没有买旅行货币？
Translate1: Have you bought any travel currency?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu zhǔnbèi jìnkǒu wùpǐn ？
Chinese1: 你有没有准备进口物品？
Translate1: Have you prepared any items for import?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu zhǔnbèi chūkǒu wùpǐn ？
Chinese1: 你有没有准备出口物品？
Translate1: Have you prepared any items for export?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu yánjiū dāngdì de jiāotōng ？
Chinese1: 你有没有研究当地的交通？
Translate1: Have you researched the local transport?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu bèifèn zīliào ？
Chinese1: 你有没有备份资料？
Translate1: Have you backed up your data?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu yùdìng rènhé tèshū fúwù ？
Chinese1: 你有没有预订任何特殊服务？
Translate1: Have you booked any special services?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu liǎojiě rènhé zhèngcè ？
Chinese1: 你有没有了解任何政策？
Translate1: Have you got an understanding of any policies?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu kǎolǜ dào mǎi lǚxíng bǎoxiǎn ？
Chinese1: 你有没有考虑到买旅行保险？
Translate1: Have you thought about buying travel insurance?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu liǎojiě rènhé dāngdì de wénhuà ？
Chinese1: 你有没有了解任何当地的文化？
Translate1: Have you gained an understanding of any local cultures?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu mǎi rènhé lǚxíng yòngpǐn ？
Chinese1: 你有没有买任何旅行用品？
Translate1: Have you bought any travel necessities?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhǔnbèi huā duōshǎo qián ？
Chinese1: 你准备花多少钱？
Translate1: How much money are you planning to spend?

Pinyin1: nǐ néng bǎ shénme dàihuíjiā ？
Chinese1: 你能把什么带回家？
Translate1: What can you bring home?

Pinyin1: zánmen qù shénme dìfāng wán ne ？
Chinese1: 咱们去什么地方玩呢？
Translate1: What place shall we go to have fun?

Pinyin1: qù xiànchǎng kànkan zěnmeyàng ？
Chinese1: 去现场看看怎么样？
Translate1: How about going to the site to take a look?

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ qù lǚxíngshè dìngpiào ma ？
Chinese1: 我们可以去旅行社订票吗？
Translate1: Can we go to the travel agency to book the tickets?

Pinyin1: zánmen yīqǐ qù zuò yīcì hǎiyáng yùndòng bā ！
Chinese1: 咱们一起去做一次海洋运动吧！
Translate1: Let's go for a marine adventure together!

Pinyin1: nǐ zhīdào zhèr yǒu shénme míngshènggǔjì ma ？
Chinese1: 你知道这儿有什么名胜古迹吗？
Translate1: Do you know any famous landmarks here?

Pinyin1: zhège dìfāng zhēnde tàiměilì le ！
Chinese1: 这个地方真的太美丽了！
Translate1: This place is really beautiful!

Pinyin1: nàli yǒu shénme zhíde yīyóu de jǐngdiǎn ？
Chinese1: 那里有什么值得一游的景点？
Translate1: What sights are worth visiting there?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de měijǐng zhēnde ràng rén jīngtàn ！
Chinese1: 这里的美景真的让人惊叹！
Translate1: The scenery here is truly awe-inspiring!

Pinyin1: qù zuìjìn de shìchǎng mǎidiǎn shénme bā ！
Chinese1: 去最近的市场买点什么吧！
Translate1: Let's go to the nearest market and buy something!

Pinyin1: wǒnéng qǐng nǐ hē dāngdì yǐnliào ma ？
Chinese1: 我能请你喝当地饮料吗？
Translate1: Can I offer you something to drink from the local cuisine?

Pinyin1: nǐ de lǚxíng jìhuà shì shénme ？
Chinese1: 你的旅行计划是什么？
Translate1: What is your travel plan?

Pinyin1: xiǎng bùxiǎng qù nǎlǐ lǚxíng ？
Chinese1: 想不想去哪里旅行？
Translate1: Where do you want to go?

Pinyin1: qù nǎlǐ kěyǐ tǐyàn dāngdì wénhuà ？
Chinese1: 去哪里可以体验当地文化？
Translate1: Where can I experience the local culture?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng chángshì dāngdì tèsèměishí ma ？
Chinese1: 你想尝试当地特色美食吗？
Translate1: Do you want to try the local speciality food?

Pinyin1: nǐ huán xiǎng qù nǎlǐ lǚxíng ？
Chinese1: 你还想去哪里旅行？
Translate1: Where else do you want to travel?

Pinyin1: lǚxíng guīhuà zhōng xūyào zuò shénme ？
Chinese1: 旅行规划中需要做什么？
Translate1: What do you need to do for your travel plan?

Pinyin1: tāmen shì shénme ？
Chinese1: 它们是什么？
Translate1: What are they?

Pinyin1: néng bùnéng gěi wǒ yīxiē jiànyì ？
Chinese1: 能不能给我一些建议？
Translate1: Can you give me some suggestions?

Pinyin1: nǐ tuījiàn qù nǎlǐ ？
Chinese1: 你推荐去哪里？
Translate1: Where do you recommend to go?

Pinyin1: nǐ jìde shōushi xíngli yào dài shénme ma ？
Chinese1: 你记得收拾行李要带什么吗？
Translate1: Do you remember packing what to take along?

Pinyin1: nǐ shénme shíhou chūfā ？
Chinese1: 你什么时候出发？
Translate1: When do you depart?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu shénme jiànyì gěi chūguó lǚkè ？
Chinese1: 你有什么建议给出国旅客？
Translate1: What advice do you have for travelers going abroad?

Pinyin1: rúhé bǐjiào hángbān de xuǎnzé ？
Chinese1: 如何比较航班的选择？
Translate1: How to compare the options of flights?

Pinyin1: nǐ zěnme gòumǎi liánjià jīpiào ？
Chinese1: 你怎么购买廉价机票？
Translate1: How do you buy cheap flights?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu mǎi lǚyóu bǎoxiǎn ma ？
Chinese1: 你有买旅游保险吗？
Translate1: Do you have travel insurance?

Pinyin1: nǐ tíqián yào zuò nǎxiē zhǔnbèi ？
Chinese1: 你提前要做哪些准备？
Translate1: What preparations do you need to make in advance?

Pinyin1: nǐ gǎnbùgǎn dúzìyīrén lǚxíng ？
Chinese1: 你敢不敢独自一人旅行？
Translate1: Do you dare travel alone?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu guīhuà nǐ yào qù nǎlǐ wán ma ？
Chinese1: 你有规划你要去哪里玩吗？
Translate1: Have you planned where you want to go for attractions?

Pinyin1: wǒmen qù nǎlǐ lǚyóu hǎo ne ？
Chinese1: 我们去哪里旅游好呢？
Translate1: Where is a good place for us to go for a vacation?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng qù nǎlǐ lǚyóu ？
Chinese1: 你想去哪里旅游？
Translate1: Where would you like to go for a trip?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu shénme lǚyóu jìhuà ？
Chinese1: 你有什么旅游计划？
Translate1: What are your travel plans?

Pinyin1: nǐ yào dài duōshǎo xíngli chūguó lǚyóu ？
Chinese1: 你要带多少行李出国旅游？
Translate1: How much luggage are you taking with you on your trip?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhǔnbèi zài nǎlǐ gòumǎi lǚyóu bǎoxiǎn ？
Chinese1: 你准备在哪里购买旅游保险？
Translate1: Where are you going to buy travel insurance?

Pinyin1: shénmeyàng de lǚyóu lùxiàn zuì yǒuqù ？
Chinese1: 什么样的旅游路线最有趣？
Translate1: What kind of travel route is the most interesting?

Pinyin1: lǚxíng yùsuàn yàohuā duōshǎo ？
Chinese1: 旅行预算要花多少？
Translate1: How much is the travel budget?

Pinyin1: wǒ yǒu yùdìng yīgè guówài lǚyóu xíngchéng ma ？
Chinese1: 我有预定一个国外旅游行程吗？
Translate1: Do I have to book an overseas tour?

Pinyin1: zhècì lǚyóu yǒu nǎxiē huódòng ānpái ma ？
Chinese1: 这次旅游有哪些活动安排吗？
Translate1: What activities are included in this trip?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng qù nǎlǐ wánshuǎ ？
Chinese1: 你想去哪里玩耍？
Translate1: Where do you want to go for fun?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhǔnbèi zài lǚxíng zhōngdàixiē shénme ？
Chinese1: 你准备在旅行中带些什么？
Translate1: What are you going to take on the trip?

Pinyin1: wǒmen néng qù nǎr wán ？
Chinese1: 我们能去哪儿玩？
Translate1: Where can we go for fun?

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ bāng nǐ pāizhào ma ？
Chinese1: 我可以帮你拍照吗？
Translate1: Can I take your picture?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yào zài nǎlǐ zhùsù ？
Chinese1: 我们要在哪里住宿？
Translate1: Where should we stay?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎngyào chéngzuò nǎ zhǒng jiāotōnggōngjù ？
Chinese1: 你想要乘坐哪种交通工具？
Translate1: Which kind of transportation do you want to take?

Pinyin1: qù jīchǎng dǎchē háishi bùxíng ？
Chinese1: 去机场打车还是步行？
Translate1: Should we take a taxi to the airport or walk?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu shénme jiànyì ma ？
Chinese1: 你有什么建议吗？
Translate1: Do you have any suggestions?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi shénme shíhou huíjiā ？
Chinese1: 我们应该什么时候回家？
Translate1: When should we go home?

Pinyin1: nǐ qù wàiguó lǚxíng guò ma ？
Chinese1: 你去外国旅行过吗？
Translate1: Have you ever been abroad?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu nǎxiē hǎo de gòuwù jiànyì ma ？
Chinese1: 你有哪些好的购物建议吗？
Translate1: Do you have any good shopping recommendations?

Pinyin1: qù zhèjiā shāngdiàn hǎo ma ？
Chinese1: 去这家商店好吗？
Translate1: Is going to this store a good option?

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ qù nǎlǐ pāizhào ？
Chinese1: 我们可以去哪里拍照？
Translate1: Where can we take a photo?

Pinyin1: zhèzhǒng jǐngguān zhēn piàoliang ， nǐ juéde ne ？
Chinese1: 这种景观真漂亮，你觉得呢？
Translate1: This landscape is beautiful, don't you think?

Pinyin1: wǒmen jīnwǎn néng dāchéng zuìhòu yī bānchē ma ？
Chinese1: 我们今晚能搭乘最后一班车吗？
Translate1: Can we catch the last bus tonight?

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zuò shénme lái fàngsōng xīnqíng ？
Chinese1: 我们可以做什么来放松心情？
Translate1: What can we do to relax?

Pinyin1: nǐ juéde wǒmen míngtiān qù yěcān zěnmeyàng ？
Chinese1: 你觉得我们明天去野餐怎么样？
Translate1: What do you think about us going on a picnic tomorrow?

Pinyin1: zhèjiā cāntīng de wǎncān jiàgé zěnmeyàng ？
Chinese1: 这家餐厅的晚餐价格怎么样？
Translate1: What is the dinner price of this restaurant?
